name: Faster One
description: Faster One was developed from a sans serif italics. In order to create an impression of velocity, the horizontal and gradual lines generate the idea of the image of the wind. Ideal for writing headlines where efficiency and speed are priorities. Updated September 2015: Internal metadata corrected. The February 2023 update features a bigger glyphset, fractions and some minor aesthetic modifications. To contribute, see github.com/etunni/faster .
author: Eduardo Tunni
